description: Students learn basic conducting gestures, with and without baton, through exercises in meter patterns, preparatory beats and cut-offs, cueing, dynamics, fermata, articulations, phrasing, left hand independence, and face/eye usage. Prerequisite: Music 114 or permission of instructor. Offered Spring Semester.
name: Conducting
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Music 114 or permission of instructor. Offered Spring Semester.
